title: WizardBasicStep Props
description: Type used to define 'basic' steps, or in other words, steps that are neither parents or children of parents.

component.description: Content shown when the step's navigation item is selected. When treated as a parent step, only sub-step content will be shown. (Type: React.ReactElement<any>)

footer.description: Replaces the step's footer. The step's footer takes precedence over the wizard's footer. (Type: React.ReactElement<any> | Partial<WizardFooterProps>)

isDisabled.description: Flag to disable the step's navigation item

isHidden.description: Flag to determine whether the step is hidden

isVisited.description: Flag to represent whether the step has been visited (navigated to)

name.description: Name of the step's navigation item (React component or element)

navItem.description: Replaces the step's navigation item or its properties. (Type: WizardNavItemType)

status.description: Used to determine icon next to the step's navItem
